Name: Patron's Escalating Leverage
Description: The deeper your debt to your patron, the more leverage they have over your queue.
Comment: Each negative token improves position by 0.5, max improvement of 3 positions

Name: Merchant Partnership Rewards
Description: Strong trade relationships yield increasing payment bonuses.
Comment: Payment bonus increases at specific trade token thresholds

Name: Trust-Based Flexibility
Description: Trusted relationships grant more flexible deadlines.
Comment: Each trust token above 3 grants +0.5 days deadline, max +4 days

Name: Shadow Network Pressure
Description: Owing the shadow network creates extreme leverage - they don't forget debts.
Comment: Shadow debt creates increasingly severe leverage at specific thresholds

Name: Noble Patronage Benefits
Description: Strong noble connections yield escalating financial rewards.
Comment: Noble favor above 5 tokens grants base +5 coins plus +2 per token

Name: Common Folk Solidarity
Description: Strong ties with common folk grant more time for their letters.
Comment: 4+ common tokens with any NPC grants +2 days deadline for their letters
